Package me.dessie.dessielib.resourcepack.assets

Class BitmapUnicodeAsset

java.lang.Object
me.dessie.dessielib.resourcepack.assets.Asset
me.dessie.dessielib.resourcepack.assets.BitmapUnicodeAsset
public class BitmapUnicodeAsset extends Asset
Replaces a Unicode character with a bitmap image that can be displayed to players. This allows you to render any image you want to any player by sending them the respective unicode.

      Parameters:

      bitmappedImage - A .png file to render as this bitmap

      Parameters:

      material - A Material to render as this bitmap

      shouldUseInAtlas - If the bitmap should be used in an atlas or referenced separately

    • BitmapUnicodeAsset

      public BitmapUnicodeAsset(String name, File bitmappedImage, int width, int height)
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the asset
      bitmappedImage - A .png file to render as this bitmap
      width - Resize the image to this width
      height - Resize the image to this height

    • BitmapUnicodeAsset

      public BitmapUnicodeAsset(String name, File bitmappedImage, int width, int height, boolean shouldUseInAtlas)
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the asset
      bitmappedImage - A .png file to render as this bitmap
      width - Resize the image to this width
      height - Resize the image to this height
      shouldUseInAtlas - If the bitmap should be used in an atlas or referenced separately

    • BitmapUnicodeAsset

      public BitmapUnicodeAsset(String name, @Nullable File bitmappedFile, @Nullable String texture, int ascent, boolean shouldUseInAtlas, int unicode)
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the asset
      bitmappedFile - A bitmap image to represent this file.
      texture - The literal texture reference, such as dessielib:font/apple.png or minecraft:item/gold_ingot.png
      ascent - The ascent of the bitmap (vertical offset) Can be negative
      shouldUseInAtlas - If the bitmap should be used in an atlas or referenced separately
      unicode - A provided Unicode integer that this Bitmap will represent.

      public int getUnicode()
      Returns:
      The Unicode character that will be used to render the Image.

    • isUsedInAtlas

      public boolean isUsedInAtlas()
      Returns:
      If the asset image is used within an atlas.

    • setAscent

      public BitmapUnicodeAsset setAscent(int ascent)
      Sets the vertical offset that the image is rendered with. This value must be greater than the height of the image.
      Parameters:
      ascent - The ascent
      Returns:
      The BitmapUnicodeAsset instance.

    • setHeight

      public BitmapUnicodeAsset setHeight(int height)
      Sets the height of the bitmap. If you want your bitmap to be resized, and it is not in an atlas this method will scale your image properly to the correct height.
      Parameters:
      height - The height of the bitmap.
      Returns:
      The BitmapUnicodeAsset instance.

    • setShouldUseInAtlas

      public BitmapUnicodeAsset setShouldUseInAtlas(boolean shouldUseInAtlas)
      Sets whether the image should be stitched with an atlas. Images within an atlas cannot be resized, however using an atlas is beneficial if you wish to save space within your resource pack. If your images are the exact size you wish to render them as, you should always use an atlas. Otherwise, if you need to resize them using setHeight(int) do not use an atlas.
      Parameters:
      shouldUseInAtlas - If the image should be used in an atlas.
      Returns:
      The BitmapUnicodeAsset instance.

    • setUnicode

      public BitmapUnicodeAsset setUnicode(int unicode)
      Manually sets the Unicode that this asset replaces.
      Parameters:
      unicode - The unicode that this image will replace.
      Returns:
      The BitmapUnicodeAsset instance.

    • setTexture

      public BitmapUnicodeAsset setTexture(String texture)
      Sets the texture reference for the image. For example dessielib:font/hannahxxTea.png minecraft:item/apple.png
      Parameters:
      texture - The texture reference String.
      Returns:
      The BitmapUnicodeAsset instance.

    • getMinecraftUnicodeFontFolder

      public File getMinecraftUnicodeFontFolder()
      Returns:
      The folder that contains the /minecraft resources. Resolves to serverDir/plugins/pluginName/assets/minecraft/font

    • getResourceUnicodeTexturesFolder

      public File getResourceUnicodeTexturesFolder()
      Returns:
      The folder that contains the namespaced resources. Resolves to serverDir/plugins/pluginName/assets/pluginName/textures/font
